content:
DataGridViewCellStyleScopes Enum

Definition

Specifies the DataGridView entity that owns the cell style that was changed.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum DataGridViewCellStyleScopes
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
DataGridViewCellStyleScopes

Remarks

This enumeration is used by DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs to indicate which part of the DataGridView owns the DataGridViewCellStyle that changed.

Fields

AlternatingRows

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle* property changed.
Cell

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style* property changed.
Column

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle* property changed.
ColumnHeaders

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle* property changed.
DataGridView

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle* property changed.
None

The owning entity is unspecified.
Row

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle* property changed.
RowHeaders

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle* property changed.
Rows

One or more values of the object returned by the stem.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle* property changed.
